price: 10. Miyeyna marin dhulka oo fiirin siday aheyd cidhibta kuwii ka horreeyey? Alle baa ku keenay baabba7’ dhan, gaaladuna waxay la kulmi isla aayahaas oo kale.
arabic: ۞ أَفَلَمۡ يَسِيرُواْ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ فَيَنظُرُواْ كَيۡفَ كَانَ عَٰقِبَةُ ٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبۡلِهِمۡۖ دَمَّرَ ٱللَّهُ عَلَيۡهِمۡۖ وَلِلۡكَٰفِرِينَ أَمۡثَٰلُهَا
footnotes: 7. Wuu baabbi’iyey iyagoo dhan iyo waxay lahaayeenba.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: afalam yasīrū fī al-arḍi fayanẓurū kayfa kāna ʿāqibatu alladhīna min qablihim dammara al-lahu ʿalayhim walil'kāfirīna amthāluhā
